message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, so I'm offering a bit over half.  Let's wrap this up before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Come on, let's meet in the middle. This is a better deal than my first offer.
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer - a slight edge to me, but still a win for both of us considering the shrinking pot. Take it before it shrinks even further!
